definition: a restriction that is insisted upon as a condition for an agreement
details:
noun
- a restriction that is insisted upon as a condition for an agreement
= synonyms: specification
- an assumption on which rests the validity or effect of something else
= synonyms: condition, precondition
- (law) an agreement or concession made by parties in a judicial proceeding (or by their attorneys) relating to the business before the court
= synonyms: judicial admission
